com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema.versioning
Class SchemaVersionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema.versioning.SchemaVersionUtils

public abstract class SchemaVersionUtils
extends Object

Collection of helper tools used for schema versioning of serialized types

Method Summary
static int decodeAvroSchemaVersion(byte versionByte)
          Attempts to decode the provided schema version byte represented by an Avro binary encoded integer
static boolean processSchemaVersion(byte versionByte, int supportedVersion)
          Processes the provided version byte to ensure that it represents a supported schema version for a serialized container type.

Method Detail

processSchemaVersion

public static boolean processSchemaVersion(byte versionByte,
                                           int supportedVersion)
Processes the provided version byte to ensure that it represents a supported schema version for a serialized container type.

Parameters:
versionByte - The byte representation of the encoded version
supportedVersion - The currently supported schema version, non-negative
Returns:
True if and only if the processed schema version matches the supported schema version
Throws:
UnknownSchemaVersionException - Thrown if the processed schema version is not supported

decodeAvroSchemaVersion

public static int decodeAvroSchemaVersion(byte versionByte)
Attempts to decode the provided schema version byte represented by an Avro binary encoded integer

Parameters:
versionByte - The byte representation of the encoded version, must be an even value in the range of [0x00,0x7E]
Returns:
The decoded version number, in the valid range of 0 to 63
See Also:
Avro Binary Encoding
